name: Park My Yacht - 3D Super Boat Parking Simulation
name_original: Park My Yacht - 3D Super Boat Parking Simulation
description:
Park My Yacht is a realistic 3D boat parking game that will keep you entertained for hours! Featuring realistic water physics, awesome yachts to choose from, and an addictive game play, you won't be able to put down this boat parking game!

To play is simple. All you have to do is choose your steering preference, then proceed to park your yacht by following the yellow markings on the water. Your goal is to park on the green parking spots. Good luck!

FEATURES

- Realistic water physics and parking mechanics.

- Awesome life-like graphics.

- Lots of levels and multiple environments. Including day & evening scenes.

If you are a fan of car, limo, truck, bus, truck, and other types of parking games, you owe it to yourself to download Park My Yacht Boat Parking 3D!
